root.name: Operation Secret Storm
root.description: OverviewOperation Secret Storm is a side-scrolling action game set in the Middle East. You play as the cleverly named Agent George, a CIA agent, who is sent to Iraq and Kuwait to combat and the forces of Saddam Hussein. Your objectives range from saving oil refineries to stopping the production of chemical and dangerous weapons. To Saddam's men, you collect power-ups that include bombs and machine guns. Or if you want to kick it Rambo style you can battle troopers with your hands and legs.
